title: About
text:
Early Warnings. Strategic Insight.
Forisca is a boutique political risk consultancy specializing in AI-powered early warning systems and forecasting tools for protests, instability, and regime change.
Based in the Netherlands ‚Äî working globally.

title: Services
text:
Country Risk Briefings
Monthly analytical reports covering socio-political trends and emerging risks.
Real-Time Dashboards
AI-powered interactive platforms with early warnings, alerts, and visual maps.
Custom Forecasts & Data Projects
Tailored insights and models to support client-specific needs.
Workshops and Training
Customized sessions on AI, forecasting, and political risk for institutional teams.

title: Home
text:
Early Warnings. Strategic Insight.
Forisca is a political risk consultancy specializing in AI-powered early warning systems and forecasting tools for protests, instability, and regime change. We combine advanced machine learning models with expert political analysis to deliver timely, actionable insights to institutions operating in volatile environments. With a regional focus on Sub-Saharan Africa and the MENA region, Forisca supports decision-makers in navigating complex risks through real-time dashboards, tailored briefings, and predictive intelligence.
